mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bearing_records (transaction_type, box_text, box_number, quantity, time, operator, depository, storage_location, customer, outer_inner_ring, model, product_category, steel_type, steel_grade, remarks) VALUES (#{transactionType}, #{boxText}, #{boxNumber}, #{quantity}, #{time}, #{operator}, #{depository}, #{storageLocation}, #{customer}, #{outerInnerRing}, #{model}, #{productCategory}, #{steelType}, #{steelGrade}, #{remarks})
mapper.update:
UPDATE bearing_records
transaction_type = #{transactionType},
box_text = #{boxText},
box_number = #{boxNumber},
quantity = #{quantity},
time = #{time},
operator = #{operator},
depository = #{depository},
storage_location = #{storageLocation},
customer = #{customer},
outer_inner_ring = #{outerInnerRing},
model = #{model},
product_category = #{productCategory},
steel_type = #{steelType},
steel_grade = #{steelGrade},
remarks = #{remarks}
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT box_text, box_number, depository, SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type IN ('入库', '转入') THEN quantity WHEN transaction_type IN ('出库', '转出', '返库') THEN -quantity END) as quantity FROM bearing_records WHERE time <= DATE_ADD(#{cutoffDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY ) GROUP BY box_text, box_number, depository
